Reviews.Title: Great little machine
Reviews.Author: M. David Liegey "David the Baker"
Reviews.Content: This little beaut has a few quirks, but for the price, I can easily overlook them.  A great "connective" gadget to take along on vacation.  Add a mouse and a keyboard and you've got all the convenience of a big laptop.  And watch streaming video from Netflix, Amazon Prime, etc.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: awsome!!! esp for the money
Reviews.Author: Michael Le Mmon
Reviews.Content: the case is a little shotty, but it connect to my computer via usb, and interacts with my pc, sharing files both ways, i can edit my google calander, and check my email, either on my pc, or on my tablet and it shows up on both, even when they are not connected. the tablet comes with adapters to fit either male or female usb plugs making it very versitile.  i love it

logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_moOELTWLIK1JU2currentClick) { return cv_moOELTWLIK1JU2currentClick(); } } } Length:: 8:50 Mins--------------------------UPDATE - August 11, 2013--------------------------Apps cannot be moved to the SD card. The tablet has internal storage and local disk storage. Local storage emulates external storage and as such is considered the primary external SD card. So any SD card that you insert can only be used to access your additional files like music and videos. Apps can only be moved between internal storage and local storage This is not the fault of the tablet, it's my understanding that this is an Android limitation on devices with more than 2gb of internal storage.Although the tablet comes with 4gb of storage, you only have access to about 2.5gb of that. Lately I've been getting an error whenever I try to download anything new, even though both the internal storage and the local disk report that there is sufficient room for the app I'm trying to download (250MB and 850MB free respectively).I have yet to figure out the sort order of apps in the app drawer. At first I thought all the pre-installed apps appeared first and later apps showed up in the order they were installed. But that's not the case, as some newer apps appear before the pre-installed ones now. Placement keeps changing because apps are moved around in the drawer when they get updated. It would be nice to have everything in alphabetical order so I don't have to go hunting for it later.Charging is erratic. Sometimes it will charge normally, but I've watched it take over a day to get a full charge. At first I thought it had a problem with power strips, but even when plugged directly into the outlet sometimes it does not charge. The first tablet did the same thing the first time I tried to charge it, but in the short time I had it it was fine thereafter. For some reason the X2 seems to stop charging when it's off or in standby. Once I start to use it (while it's still plugged in) it will quickly begin to charge. After a full charge, I get a little over 2 hours of use.I found the speaker volume to be too low for watching movies, but thankfully the headphone jack works just fine.The wifi still drops in and out the further away I get from the router, but surprisingly I have been able to watch Netflix and other videos with very little buffering when upstairs from the router.I've had to reinstall XBMC once. I couldn't access any menus past the home screen. XBMC for Android is still in its early stages so I'm just happy that it works at all.THE BOTTOM LINE: The Nero X2 plays games and videos, but don't expect it to compete with a Nexus 7 or an iPad in the features or build quality department. Higher expectations will only lead to frustration and dissapointment. It's an OK tablet... not great. This tablet fits into a certain price range to serve a particular market. If it were to cost anywhere near the price of a Nexus 7, I would have given it 1 star. Because of the download errors, charging issues, and the problems from the original review, I've decided to lower my rating to 3 out of 5 stars.------------------ORIGINAL REVIEW------------------Looking at the specs alone, this tablet would be a steal at under 80 dollars. But practically speaking it's probably priced just right. If it weren't for the screen distortion (ripple effect shown in video), weak wifi antenna, and narrow viewing angle, I would have given it 5 stars. As it stands, I was tempted to give it 3, but the low price forced me to temper my expectations from the get go. For the price it's a decent tablet.Bought one tablet, returned it, and Matricom sent out another. Both tablets had plastic stuck between the bezel and the glass. And both tablets came with the ripple effect problem. The screen of the first tablet was very dark and didn't always respond to touch input. Increasing the brightness level drained the battery that much faster. I know that sometimes you get a bad unit, but since both tablets had some of the same problems I worry about quality control.In most areas, the Nero X2 would fall short when compared to a more expensive tablet. But frankly, I don't mind sacrificing a few features to get a decent tablet that does the majority of the things I want it to do. This tablet runs most of the apps I use on my Nexus 7. Including: Nook, Documents to Go, Avabel (3D gaming - graphics are adjusted for low memory), Netflix, XBMC, Hulu Plus and Subway Surfers to name a few.PROS HDMI out Expansion up to 32gb Google Play Store Plays most apps Android Jelly Bean 4.1.1 USB charging USB OTG Root access MiniUSB to USB adapter included Capacitive stylus included CONS Screen exhibits ripple effect Very narrow viewing angle Screen display not very vibrant Weak wifi antenna Weak speakers Proprietary power adapter Minimal on-board storage and ram No BluetoothDIDN'T EXPECT IT FOR THE PRICE, BUT WOULD HAVE BEEN NICE TO HAVE More sensors like gyroscope and light sensor GPS NFCThere is no documentation inside the box about how to reach the company. There is a web address on the outside of the box: matricom dot net. There you'll find a support email address and a phone number. I've had mixed success with customer service. Some emails have gone unanswered. I called the support number and no one answered. When I complained about the first tablet, it took 5 days to get an email response. But I also received a follow up phone call the same day. They promised to ship a new tablet out that day... and they did. That was nice, until I asked a question the representative couldn't answer. She put me on hold to go find the answer, but she never came back. I waited over 30 minutes on speakerphone before finally hanging up.All in all, it's a nice tablet. If you just need a basic tablet that won't break the bank this one should fit the bill. If they would just fix the screen and wifi issues, I'd buy more.This review was done as part of a video review promotion for the Matricom .Tab Nero X2 and I've tried to be fair and honest in my assessment.

Reviews.Title: What a fraud!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: persio
Reviews.Content: I just received this tablet for my little girl and she was in tears because the tablet does not charge, after 20 minutes usebattery was dead and tI tried to charge it and DID NOT WORK!!,, HOW HOME AMAZON DOES NOT TEST THE ITEM TO BE SHIP BEFORE???? THIS IS UNNACEPTABLE AND I AM RETURNING IT,, Plus i have yo return it now..

Reviews.Title: NICE ENTRY LEVEL TAB
Reviews.Author: bfosbenner
Reviews.Content: THIS IS A NICE ENTRY LEVEL TAB, MANY FEATURES, SCREEN ANGLE IS NOT GREAT BUT OK FOR THIS PRICE RANGE

Reviews.Title: Tab Nero x2 best most affordable tablet
Reviews.Author: M. Natafji "mark nata"

Reviews.Title: works great with apps/google play store; 2hour battery
Reviews.Author: tom
Reviews.Content: I bought this to act as a remote for squeezelite running on linux media servers and raspberry pi acting as zones like sonus.for the price of mid 70's it does it's function well.the pros:* I have had no issues with running apps via google play store. This is huge for me.* the display is quick/responsive and the zoom/multitouch works very well.* hdmi out.* 32Gbyte micro sd card slot, I'm using a class 10 and it works fine.the cons:* short battery life of maybe 2hours max.* wifi in line of site is variable at 15feet .. ie 1 bar to 4 bars.* camera seems to be low resolution 640x480* I could not get a usb keyboard to work.* I have to have the display brightness turned up to full to really use it, this just might be me.* about 30% of the 'key clicks' don't sound when typing; it doesn't effect me typing other than it would be nice to have the sound feedback on all the keystrokes and not just 70% of them.* screen display is a little hard to see unless you view it vertically 30deg to 90deg(straight on) top to bottom. Side to side viewing angle is fine, close to 180deg landscape mode. The display darkens outside of that 30-90deg range vertically and becomes unreadable.I've only had it a day at this point and I'm glad I bought it.day 2:* netflix, spotify, pandora, comcast on demand ie hbo, all work great.price went up from the mids 70's, I'll buy a couple more when it comes down again.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic little giant..
Reviews.Author: Rafael Rivera
Reviews.Content: It does everything that any expensive table does.  Perfect video playing, cameras front and back are perfect, music nice and clear, charges fast and last long, even when playing HD movies.  The only thing I didn't like was the protective screen skin that came with it, it seems that it was used before.  Over all a perfect little giant.

Reviews.Title: Do NOT buy this!
Reviews.Author: ghostina
Reviews.Content: These are poorly made and operate below any standards I ever experienced.  Gets so hot to the touch, I could barely hold it (maybe that is why they recommend a case!).  Casing is so thin one can see the movement of fingers on the BACK of the device on the SCREEN.  Freezes, and I don't believe mine was new, although it was advertised as such, because the tutorial didn't show until I reset everything to factory settings.

Reviews.Title: which i could give it 0 Star
Reviews.Author: elshe
Reviews.Content: got this tablet today and have to say its a money well spend the tablet run very smooth and starts up face etc...the only issue is the front camera it ok but its a lil blurry but the back one works fine...good tablet..money well spent UPDATED:had this tablet about two weeks now WAS impress about its performance and suddenly i start getting battery problems and black screen, a waste of money... and am from the caribbean so i cant ship back because its to expensive..stay away and avoid being in my position

Reviews.Title: TabNerox2
Reviews.Author: Holly Merrill
Reviews.Content: I just recently got my tabnerox2 today, and it works straight out of the box. Was even charged and I didn't even have to do that. If you don't want to spend hundreds of dollars on a tablet. This little guy is well worth the buy. Yes its a little slow on loading web pages. But the positives of what it can do outweigh the negatives. I suggest getting this little guy as your first tablet if your not familiar with android. I mainly bought this product because my dad wanted one. He is not computer savy and I knew that if he had problems he would look to me to answer them. Being that I am on the computer most of the time.I should be able to help him with any questions that arise. I will more than likely buy from this company again.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Danielle
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my boyfriend and he absolutely loves it. He just wanted something simple to keep him occupied nothing serious.August 22 It over heats, shuts off, wont turn back on and doesnt work right.

Reviews.Title: Stay away from this tablet and possibly the whole Matricom company
Reviews.Author: Regan Gavin
Reviews.Content: I received the product today packed in a generic USPS paper folder that had the sticker on it of what was inside.  I'm surprised it didn't get stolen or damaged considering it doesn't say fragile on it anywhere and there was no bubble wrap or any protection.I went to start charging the tablet and the battery bar on it was almost full so I powered it on.  It started right up and I saw the battery was at 78%.  It has two games that have already been downloaded onto it - Angry Birds and Fruit Ninja.  The browser has at least 30+ search entries and there are also 5 search entries in Youtube.  This tablet is obviously used and not new.  Also though it boasts 4GB storage, the storage on my device shows 1.57GB available.The instruction booklet is written in poorly broken English and is useless.  My favorite is:  "After startup the screen or the opening picture has been appear , the the device appear shutdown  3. Check the music file wherther damaged."

Reviews.Title: screen breaks to easy
Reviews.Author: christopher
Reviews.Content: Screen broke right after I got it cause u have to push to hard for it to work. Wasnt to happy with product and they wouldnt let me return it.

Reviews.Title: Horrible! Not worth your Money, Time or your Frustration! DO NOT BUY! Zero Stars
Reviews.Author: Sameerah
Reviews.Content: Horrible! I bought one last month and immediately a few buttons including the backspace button would never work, the power would only last about 20 minutes and only gotten worse. After tolerating it then notifying Amazon & the seller 30 days now had to be replaced thru the insurance that I also bought. Bought a 2nd one hoping the same problems wouldn't occur. Immediately noticed same & worse problems with 2nd tablet. Same & more buttons malfunctions, power drains & would not connect to internet but worse the so-called new tablet USB cords came completely rusted while in its package. Horribly made, parts of sold & packaged damaged and both tablets were purchased at my expense instead of Amazon & Seller replacing/exchanging! I would NEVER recommend even if it were given for free.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product!!
Reviews.Author: Paulo Roberto Silva de Oliveira
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed the tab nero. By setting up shows a very attractive product. The processor delivers what it promises. recommend to all. Excellent cost benefit.

Reviews.Title: only 2 GB instead of 4 like it should be and...
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I wish the HDMI output for Netflix on my HDTV looked good but it makes the movies look horrible, you have to make the picture on the TV way too small before it will look decent, that is the reason I got it. but for the price what can you expect I thought it would be okay on the TV don't get me wrong the tablet itself looks good on my HDTV but the Netflix does not when streaming, also it cuts me off my wifi for no reason and it does it when it wants to, it says it has 4GB of space the one I got has only 2GB, like most people say spend more money on a tablet and get the one you will like I say the same I am trying to return this tablet now so I can get a better one. other than what I said its not a bad tablet just not what I wanted it for, I hope this helps everyone.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet so far
Reviews.Author: ruth e hanneman
Reviews.Content: Well when I pulled it out of the box it was dead so I charged it and a line of white kept blinking on the screen and then disapeard after about 5 minutes and didn't come back until a couple days ago but it went away again so I'm not to worried about it.Its a fast tablet and very easy to use but the SD card I bought was defective so it isn't working but I think its the SD card.I don't think for seventy bucks you can get much better so I'm happy.

Reviews.Title: so far so good-update
Reviews.Author: zanna
Reviews.Content: Bought the Matricom nero tab x2 for my son. been using it 3 days non-stop and it's working well; playing games, facebook, taking pics. there can be a glare on the screen, the cam is not fantastic, volume is good and battery lasts 2-3 hours. But, so far so good for the money.UPDATE: 3 weeks since I bought this product. still going strong.

Reviews.Title: Solid Tablet
Reviews.Author: Tim "Timdiana" Dunn
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet. It works as well as ipad or google tablet as pretty solid as tablet standards. I was suprised at how well I was able to connect to my AccuRave ELM327 Bluetooth OBD2 Diagnostic Code Scanner - Scan Tool Check Engine Light CAR Code Reader - Android Compatible. Anyways, I recommend trying this tablet out. It might surprise you.

Reviews.Title: Poor product
Reviews.Author: Nancy L
Reviews.Content: I have had previous tablets and didn't have any problems with them; however this one had problems from the beginning. Battery life was short from the beginning despite charging per the guidelines; instruction booklet was dismal with very limited instructions (along with poor grammer from whoever wrote it). I had immediate trouble with downloading games and glitches. I had the tablet for 1 week and then it completely died- unable to charge or turn on. Would not recommend this to anyone; very disappointing.

Reviews.Title: I had higher expectations based on reviews
Reviews.Author: Maria Sofia Antoniadis
Reviews.Content: I saw a few videos of reviews on this product and decided to buy it because it looked like a good product.Now I got it. First of all, the amazon package was sealed outside, but the tablet's box inside was opened, I know this because it had tape on the sides and the tape was cut. So, this product is not new.The screen protector was already ripped off, I don't understand how could this happen if I bought a NEW PRODUCT.They sent me a used one, the screen had fingerprints on it and it was fully charged, most of the time when you buy an electronic device it comes with a little battery and you have to charge it for a good while, well, this one didn't need that.The tablet is VERY slow, seriously slow, and for some reason while you're reading a webpage or something, suddenly jumps to another thing without you touching anything and it becomes frustrating since you can't do what you want.I DO NOT recommend this product at all.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: davegt29
Reviews.Content: I really like this tablet.  I would recommend it highly to anyone looking for a tablet.  I was totally shocked at how good this tablet is.  The battery lasts a pretty good while, I would say with heavy surfing around 4 or 5 hours.  With a small amount of surfing it would last around 7 hours.  Great item!

Reviews.Title: It's not working properly sucks
Reviews.Author: marvin melendez
Reviews.Content: Very poor quality. Item came damage (it's not taking charged) now I have to deal with th insurance company let see how this work. Never again I rather pay a lil more for brand names.

Reviews.Title: 7" Tab Nero x2 DUAL Core Android 4.1 Multitouch Tablet PC (black)
Reviews.Author: Dillon
Reviews.Content: Purchased this Tablet for my daughter, she loves it ! Downloaded some games of of google play store with no problem. I use it to check email and go on Facebook, Buy things on Amazon, Watch videos on Youtube. Its a fantastic tablet worth more than what I paid for it.7" .TAB Nero x2 Dual Core Android 4.1 Multi-Touch Tablet PC (Black)

Reviews.Title: Faster than my Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: A. Sanderlin "Rocket Scientist"
Reviews.Content: This is my 6-yr old's replacement for another brand's sub $100 tablet that stopped charging after 6 months. This one is faster, even faster than my 1st Gen Kindle fire. His paid apps in the amazon store transferred to the new tablet easy, just had to add his device online first.Cameras are a nice addition also. For $70 +/- we are both happy.

Reviews.Title: not what it looks like
Reviews.Author: mauriceb71
Reviews.Content: The screen was scratched when I got it, and you have to turn it a certain way in order to view anything. The battery last maybe an 1and a half before it dies and that is with me just playing 3-4 games if candy crush. I would not recommend this item.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: triniitgirl
Reviews.Content: I am updating my review because I reviewed the wrong item. However, it still stands because the review was intended for another 7" Matricom tablet  ( 7" Matricom .TAB Nero Tablet PC - Android 4 Capacitive Multi-Touch 4GB (Blue)). The review below is the single camera, not the dual camera which I only purchased last week. Will submit another review once I have gotten the item, fingers crossed it will be just a good as the first.I bought this tablet for my son and so far it works great. He has had it for a little over 2 month and no complaints. The battery last about 3 hrs, thats with playing games, listening to music and chatting on facebook. It last longer if the WIFI is not on. He has downloaded endless games and is very happy with their performance, I have not heard him complain once that a game is not working correctly. On two occassions though, he indicated that facebook did not load correctly and the screen was looking scrambled, but the issue rectified itself with in couple os seconds. The only other issue is the glare, at certain angles in the sunlight you are unable to see anything on the screen, but for him that is a none issue, just change position. Great buy at a reasonable cost. It gets 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: There are better options at this point
Reviews.Author: Nena Patrick
Reviews.Content: I had bought this so my father in law could use it to Skype with us. It worked fine for about a week and then died. It wasn't very impressive when it did work, mainly because the screen was so awful to look at. Bad color and viewing angles especially.I bought it for 77 dollars and have to say that it's well worth spending the extra money to just get a first gen nexus 7.There are much better options that cost just a little more.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy !!!!
Reviews.Author: louis brown
Reviews.Content: This product started going bad in less than 2 weeks, it started to get a white screen first a little then it just got worst,  had to send it back for a refund, even when it was working ok at a slight angle you had problem seeing what you were looking at, maybe I just got the lemon of the bunch.

Reviews.Title: Value for price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet to play games and music. It is all I expected. It is great for the price.

Reviews.Title: Very High Quality, Met Every Expectation and More!
Reviews.Author: Shannon
Reviews.Content: * High quality screen* Lightweight* Helpful apps pre-loaded* Came with charger, earbuds, stylus pen, and a connection cable* Only drawback was the volume capability, it could be louder

Reviews.Title: Screen touch damaged
Reviews.Author: moraima torres
Reviews.Content: The screen touch of the table came damaged. I would like to know the telephone number of you and an email to communicate directly because the table does not work well and I would send the tablet and that my money be refunded as soon as possible.-Why did you choose this rating ?I chose this rating because the tablet came damaged-factory and did not fulfill my expectations as a customer.-What did you like or dislike?I dislike because it is a product that I didn't use and it even damaged.-Who would you recommend this product to?I would not recommend this product to nobody

Reviews.Title: Good for the money !
Reviews.Author: Pistol Pete
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my wife due to an upcoming surgery which means lots of down time. We have an ipad however I use it for work so it can't stay home with her. The tab Nero arrived and we charged it first then powered it up and to our surprise it is very quick. I was not expecting much in the way of performance for the price but I was wrong. The down side appears to be the battery which died in about 3 hours of use. The screen looks and feels a bit cheap however the whole tablet actually feels very nice when you hold it in your hands. Overall we are pleased so far but time will tell.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: mj
Reviews.Content: Received it a lil over two weeks ago didn't use it much cuz I didn't have wifi/internet service. So the day I get wifi installed (today aug 28 2013) I started using it I was in the middle of watching a video when the screen went completely black plug charger in thinking it might have died nope the battery don't pop up so it's not charging hmmmm hit the power button it won't turn on smh idk wth could've happened im disappointed depending how they handle this I'll cum back with a diff review damn was really looking forward to using this... and I recommended it to my friend cuz it was cheap n it got good reviews for the most part... smh I have no lucl damn im so sad n hurt right now

Reviews.Title: No Complaints
Reviews.Author: Georges D
Reviews.Content: It is what i expected for my kid.I have no complaints at all.i would really recommend it to my folks.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: Travis Dehart
Reviews.Content: Received quicklyI like it but not enough storage.  You don't even get the 4GB it says and it's not even 2GB of free storage.

Reviews.Title: Tab Nero X2 issues
Reviews.Author: Matty876

I bought 2 of these tabs 1 in blue and other in black. The black 1 doesn't work without the charger plugged in and the blue 1 is showing the same signs.

Reviews.Title: didn't last
Reviews.Author: garyb
Reviews.Content: I got this for my grown son. He used it for 4 months and it quit working. True it was cheap but i expected more than 4 months.

Reviews.Title: excellent

Reviews.Content: Bought this for someone else. The screen broke 6 months later. The back where the speaker is attached came lose after it was dropped a dozen plus times. Still works, but a broken touch screen it a pain to use, so I bought a larger cheap one. Fot the price I was surprised how much abuse it took before it was damaged. Great for the money.

Reviews.Author: Manuel R.
Reviews.Content: This table lasted about 7 months.  It was performing ok, but like most tablets and cellphones from China, it shut off one day by itself and that was it.

Reviews.Title: Cheaply made and slow
Reviews.Author: Diana Nance
Reviews.Content: Cheaply made and soo slow the power button broke not to long after having it also was a waste of money wish I had of went with a good brand the first time

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: sgwiggy2003
Reviews.Content: it is very neat. my son likes it very much. my daughter and my other son wants one. It loads fast and can acess almost everything u are looking for on it.

Reviews.Title: BAD
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these. The first didnt work the second had many glitches but still kindof worked. Never recieved any help on returns but now its to late because of time and kids.

Reviews.Title: Nero Tablet
Reviews.Author: Tammy J Zimmerly
Reviews.Content: We had to send it back right away.  Didn't work and the charger that was sent with it, didn't fit the tablet.  Very disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Like the idea and price, wish it were more reliable
Reviews.Author: Robert V. Nightingale
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet.  I've used PCs for over 30 years.  I like the volume of free Android apps, Facebook, email, browsers, etc.  It's wonderful to watch old TV shows on Netflix in bed with headphones on.  The downside is that it reboots or goes dark without warning.  But given the price and the convenience of the smaller size vs. my laptop, I've learned to live with the quirks.  I just hold down the start/stop key for 10 seconds, let it cool down, and then start again.  Use the 2Amp  wall charger instead of the USB port.  I bought a spare for $10.  Looking forward to the next generation of <$100 tablets.

Reviews.Title: Just ok
Reviews.Author: melameb
Reviews.Content: This tablet is ok. Don't try to compare it the the more expensive ones. It would lag sometimes. Its ok for a first time tablet owner or someone on a budget. After I had it for about 6 months it wouldn't hold a charge and then stopped turning on all together. Luckily I purchased a squae trade warranty with it, which I highly recommend. So I used my amazon GC and added some money of my own to get a better one. Overall I really wouldn't recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: does not last
Reviews.Author: hazel pollard
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter's 7th birthday September 2013, it started giving trouble before Christmas. first the volume control adjusted itself while using then stopped working. So she used the screens control. In January 2014, it did not want to come on after charging, now it is not coming on at all but it gets warm. Not worth it...I'm done

Reviews.Title: really cheap do not buy
Reviews.Author: king david
Reviews.Content: I got this for my son as a gift and the screen cracked  when it was charging also after 3 days of use the tab started to freeze up and run slow I had to keep turning it off and on but it never worked right

Reviews.Title: 7" .TAB Nero x2 Dual Core Android
Reviews.Author: Tasha L. Harris "Tasha Harris"
Reviews.Content: i wish i could have drawn out this tablet.  put the cord in a different place and the holes on the side  cuz now  only after a few short months the cord doesnt work  cuz its always in the  bent position.  the attaching  usb  is in the way of the  volume, it doesnt come on sometimes.  it goes off and back on in  30 seconds. cant sit outside and read anything -glare.being a reader of instructions, he tiny booklet is not possible to read at all.so  for the cheapy price its ok ..i should have waited cuz now i need to send it back already to get an exchange cuz it stays off now more than it stays on.  i have to buy a longer  cord  so it  can lay flat and  keep the charger charging.it serves as a good gift fore 10yr olds for playing some games and outube vids.  Not for a business person.glad i got that extra insurance on it. it must go back for exchange.

Basically wanted this as a starter tablet for them to show they could treat it right.  Wouldn't work for big apps and is slow at times, have had issues with turning it on and off, but works ok.  If you can spend more money and get a better newer one, I would do that.  But if need cheap starter this is ok.

Reviews.Title: Android Fail

Reviews.Content: This is just an example of getting what you pay for or this device in particular was faulty. The charger didn't fit in correctly thus it was tough to charge. It was very difficult to get to turn on. When it did come on, it was ok.

Reviews.Title: longeivity
Reviews.Author: debra waller
Reviews.Content: This tablet doesn't seem to have the endurance capacity to entertain for long periods of time. I purchased this tablet for a 10 yr old and he spent hours on it then it died. couldn't charge, didn't turn on so for one week the price is too high

Reviews.Title: Tab Terrible
Reviews.Author: albrightrl
Reviews.Content: Battery life is horrible.  Unit needs to be plugged in several times daily basis after an hours use.  Would not recommend this table to anyone.

Reviews.Title: User Manual for Tablet PC
Reviews.Author: Willie B. Underwood
Reviews.Content: The User Manual is the worst I have ever seen.  It was obviously written by someone in China who has a poor grasp of the English language.  Here is a typical sentence taken from page 13:  "Click the <volume setting> can set up the notice, the media and the alarm of volume and choose the prompt operation sound and the bell and software disk boot switch voice."  My guess is that the instructions are probably a poor translation from instructions written in chinese hieroglyphs.

Reviews.Title: Not worth it.
Reviews.Author: Renekki Wilson
Reviews.Content: The tablet stopped working after 2 months. Unable to return. Waste of money. Suggest purchasing some type of extended repair plan.

Reviews.Title: Get a national brand instead
Reviews.Author: Brig B.
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet as kind of a "protection plan" for my wife's iPad (so the kids wouldnt really ask or want to play with hers) and for that purpose, it has been good.  The expandable memory is great.  We got a couple of 32gb cards and they hold a ton of movies.  The battery dies quickly.  We have to charge it daily whether we use it or not.  It will freeze (like an old windows computer) if it gets used for too long or plays a movie too long.  Also, the back gets extremely hot ( could be a cause of the freezing up )  We got an RCA from walmart at the same time and we are happier with that tablet.  The RCA is less glitchy.

Reviews.Title: My Son loves it so much
Reviews.Author: jenice cubillas
Reviews.Content: It is very easy to move from one screen to the other, and my 8 yr old loves it and when it dropped and cracked he was so devestated but was able to get another one through the protection plan right away from the refund received.

Reviews.Title: Will not start up after 3 months of use. Horrible customer service.
Reviews.Author: Ella T.
Reviews.Content: Will not start up after 3 months of use. Horrible customer service. After using this tablet only for three months to read books, this tablet stopped working. I tried to get in touch with the Matricom customer service with no success. I waited on the phone for an hour and no one picked up. Their website is a joke too. It says you can chat with the customer service, however, they don't even provide a link or a button where we can start the chat. Eventually I emailed them, which opened an automatic ticket on their end, however, it's been hours and no human being has replied or acknowledge the inquiry.I will not recommend this to my friends and family. I feel horrible for even buying this thing for my grandma, simply embarrassing.

Reviews.Title: I hightly recommend

Reviews.Title: Excellent

Reviews.Title: Ideal for children

Reviews.Content: Bought this for my daughters 12th birthday. For the current market you can't beat it. Perfect for a child and it is cheaper than the Nintendo DS or Sony PSP, I paid 77$ at the time of purchase. Not recommending for adults. Came with screen saver, stylus, ear bugs, plug to make compatible with keyboard, sd plug,regular outlet charger and HDMI plug. Ordered the Skque Universal Magic Girl PU Leather Flip Stand Case Cover w/ USB Keyboard for 7 Inch Tablets, Blue and they are perfectly compatible with each other.

All accessories with the exception of a case are included, there is even a USB adapter to hook up a full sized keyboard.The packaging is high quality and Matricom left nothing to be desired with this tablet!!

Reviews.Content: Works Great!!! It has all the tools of a more expensive tablet...My wife has been using it since the day she got it and has had no problems.

Now after 3 weeks of ownership it goes to a black screen while you are playing a game and the key pad does not work right. In my opinion this is a piece of crap and a waste of money.

Reviews.Title: waste of money...huge let down for my daughter (It was her Birthday present)
Reviews.Author: Jamie Gonzales
Reviews.Content: The power button broke right away it got stuck inside and now is not usable.  I am very disappointed in this device.

Reviews.Title: Its O.K
Reviews.Author: Random person
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet because of the cheap price of it, got here in a fast timing (chose Saturday shipping), and as soon as i got it, turned it on and it worked just fine.  Hooks up to a HDMI T.V if you use a mini-HDMI to full size HDMI wire (not included).  It comes with a micro-usb to full sized USB cable, pen to use as a sort of stylus.  And some other normal stuff you would expect it to come with.After about some months, it slowed down quite a bit, the 512mb of ram was being all used up, and the processor couldnt handle it.I wasnt using it like a power user, just light browsing, occasional video to the T.V through the mini-HDMI.  But it just slowed down, I think doing a factory reset would of fixed that, but i ended up giving it to a friend.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Joel Tello Guzmán
Reviews.Content: very cheap materials, you can feel the rough edges. It came with some scratches on the screen, nothing really serious.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet

Reviews.Content: The Nero X2 is a good tablet and you can do just about anything on it, but sometimes it has problems starting up, it takes it a while to get started but besides the start up problem it is a very good tablet.  I also got a 32GB SD card to boost the memory because half of the memory it comes with is used for the operating system.

Reviews.Content: I wanted to get my 5 year old a tablet that was inexpensive so that if he broke it I wouldn't be too upset.  So far so good, it is easy to use, easy to get free games on and big enough to see well on.  My only concern is it's battery life, which seems to run out fast, so if your constantly on the go, you many want to rethink this one.

I first bought a tablet from Fry's for $80 with only the front camera, and after having it for a month the screen and the time was messed up. This tablet is so much better and was cheaper! I definitely recommend this to people. The only cons would be that when you take pictures and post them on fb they are about half the size, and that you can't use weather channel or instagram on it but still great.

Now it turns off when playing some games and no human force can make it back. It must be laying under the moon influence for few hours and it can turn on again ...What to say: I do not recommend this item to any one. I will not buy nothing from this manufacturer anymore.

Reviews.Content: It's a good first tablet. Good for downloading all sorts of apps, though, it can only seem to download two to three games, so choose carefully.  But it still is good for the price.

Reviews.Title: Its an ok product for what it costs
Reviews.Author: Cherilyn Bethel
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my twelve year old. She likes it except the battery dies really quickly and the wifi signal keeps dropping. But for what it costs, its acceptable

Reviews.Title: So Far So Good

Reviews.Content: Great little Tablet for my 7 year old. She thinks it is great. Only have had it for a week but so far so good!

Reviews.Title: EHH.... ITS OK FOR KIDS
Reviews.Author: SAINTSIN
Reviews.Content: FAST FOR GAMES AND WRITING AND SURFING INTERNET...BUT THE SCREEN CLARITY SUCKS. ONE INCH IN ANY DEGREE AND YOU SEE NEGATIVE GHOST IMAGES OF THE SCREEN...GOOD FOR KIDS...

Reviews.Title: Started off good - until power button became unreliable.
Reviews.Author: newlinux
Reviews.Content: UPDATE:Unfortunately I can no longer reliable turn these on. Is there any technical support on these? If I can't get these to turn on they are useless to me. Seems the power button often does nothing, even when the tablet has been charging all night... Then mysteriously the power button will work again at some point. Anyone know what the trick is? Gonna go down to 1 star if I can't reliably turn it on - my kids have no patience and I need to be able to rely on it.__________________________________________________First thing to note is that I want to say is that I've only had this for about 4 hours. I bought both the black and the blue one. So far I'm happy with it. It seems extremely responsive and no bugs so far. A few details I've noticed:* It has a mini-hdmi port and a micro-USB port. I've seen a lot of conflicting information on the sizing (mini/micro) of the ports on this model and this is what I have on both of my models.* It has an included charger, but charges via micro-USB just fine.* Battery life with moderate usage (downloading apps, playing movies, configurations) was a little over 3 hours.* Comes with screen protector, stylus, micro-USB to USB cable (for charging or connecting to computer), micro USB to USB adapter (for connecting to an external hard drive/flash drive), power adapter and headphones.* No bluetooth, no GPS - but at this price point I shouldn't be expecting it.Although it says it supports wireless N, it doesn't recognize my 5Ghz network, only my 2.4Ghz network. So it only supports one band of wireless N.I'll add more as I play more, but so far so good! My plan is to give these two tablets to my children after I configure and play with them a bit.

Reviews.Title: great for child
Reviews.Author: steven david
Reviews.Content: Its cool for my newborn son but other then that if I needed to use it its real slow even with a direct connect

Reviews.Title: grear for the price
Reviews.Author: bigmoe1866 "bigmoe1866"
Reviews.Content: Just as described, works perfectly and good quality, I would recommend this product to anyone as it is working out perfectly.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT GREAT TABLET
Reviews.Author: LoveAmazon
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic tablet! I got it for my birthday and I absolutely LOVE it! It is a great fast little tablet and im so glad I bought it. It more than I expected and for such a low price. I have had no problems with it so far and its  great. Just make sure to charge it as soon as you get it in the mail! I defintley recommend this amazing product! :)

Reviews.Title: 7" .TAB Nero x2 Dual Core Android 4.1 Multi-Touch Tablet PC (Black)
Reviews.Author: Kevin Freeman
Reviews.Content: Awesome product! I'm very pleased that I was able to buy a product like this one before. Very interesting.to buy.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT PURCHASE!
Reviews.Author: M "PSN: rivencleft"
Reviews.Content: This thing is a piece of junk. Bought as a present for son's birthday. It worked 5 minutes then apps would not open. The battery died in 20 minutes. Plugged in to charge and would not charge. Straight out of box the thing did not work. Worst money ever spent. Giant waste of time. The screen is crap also. You must be looking at it straight no to see. Should you turn it or angle it you can not see anything on the screen. What a dissapointment for my kid and myself. WIll never purchase this brand of anything again. This thing is utter junk!

Reviews.Title: Tablet had a permanent line in the screen
Reviews.Author: Jeff Everett
Reviews.Content: I ordered the tablet and it was defective with a line in the tablet. No big deal so I returned it per the instructions with the paperwork. I was never contacted by the vendor after a couple of weeks had passed. I then contacted the vendor to ask if they received the item back and if a new one was shipped. They told me they lost the paperwork and refunded me instead (Which they did). I did not want a refund I wanted a replacement, because I had already bought the warranty and a case!! So now I have a worthless case and warranty because I am not ordering from them again. They also did not refund my shipping their defective tablet!

Reviews.Title: WARNING!!!!!!!  Do not by this product!!!This this is a WASTE
Reviews.Author: Kathy-ann  Mendoza
Reviews.Content: This thing is a WASTE.  Poor quality, Poor design just in a HOOOOT mess. Not even my 5yr old nephew likes it. Don't waste your time and money on this

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Hap E. Customer
Reviews.Content: This thing is a piece of crap! It's slow and the screen doesn't even work! Give me my money back, and send this piece of garbage back to Asia where it belongs!

Reviews.Title: waste of money terrible
Reviews.Author: Dslaton
Reviews.Content: It never allowed me to go to the play store difficult to use waste of money please don't buy this

Reviews.Title: misleading
Reviews.Author: cathy
Reviews.Content: says its a 4/1 gb but they dont tell you have is used already for the programs. so get a extra card for it. but it keeps freezing up.

Reviews.Title: cheap and working well
Reviews.Author: Jme
Reviews.Content: I didn't purchase it for me, I purchased it for my husband and he seems to enjoy it. planning on buying one for my daughters birthday

Reviews.Title: Pure Crap
Reviews.Author: Heather Kincaid
Reviews.Content: Could not get most apps to download. It kept throwing errors. Now after 2 weeks it will not charge ir turn on! Biggest piece of junk tablet ever. Fo mot waste your money!!!

Reviews.Title: research before u buy
Reviews.Author: anichole
Reviews.Content: You get what u pay for so really cant complain. Wish I would of made a more wiser choice. Think first

Reviews.Title: The price can't be beat
Reviews.Author: Mackelaus
Reviews.Content: Yes, this tablet is cheap. Yes there are a million other cheap tablets out there that are slightly more expensive than this tablet. What I've found this tablet to be is extremely responsive with a decent battery life. I bought one for each of my children for their birthdays and am extremely glad I did. I know there are childrens tablets out there but they are really price prohibitive. For the cost of one of the low end kids tablets, I was able to buy to mid range tablets.

Reviews.Title: I lost my money
Reviews.Author: Wilson D. Valencia
Reviews.Content: With 3 weeks of use, the Tablet lost the sound, just sounds with headphones, in the manufacturer's page the product does not exist, and the seller does not give me answers to my questions.

ProductInfo.Features:
The new Nero x2 featuring the newest 2013 powerful and robust x15 Dual Core CPU with a top frequency of 1.2GHz pushes Android to the next level while maintaining affordability. The x2 has double the processing power of the original .TAB Nero making gaming and web browsing more fluid than ever before.
Dual Camera design lets you snap pictures and take video that's happening in the real world. Integrated Mini HDMI allows you to connect your tablet to your television to share with the entire family.
The multi-touch 7" display features the higher 1024x600 resolution over the original Nero makes videos look great and conveniently fits more content onscreen.
802.11 b/g/n integrated wireless keeps you connected on the go. Stay in touch with your friends and family, download your favorite apps, video chat with your loved ones. Stream video and music from your favorite websites with ease.
Runs on the latest Android 4.1.1 Jelly Bean OS which brings tons of new features to your Nero x2. Install all of your favorite apps from the Google Play Store (included). Ability to side-load apps from SD card if you prefer.
ProductInfo.Name: 7" .TAB Nero x2 Dual Core Android 4.1 Multi-Touch Tablet PC (Black)
